channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Series Finale Is A Crushing Disappointment
item.description: After years of buildup, Netflix's flagship series ends not with a bang, but with a whole lot of whimpering.

item.title: It Buys For Us: 3 Major Risks Of AI In Ecommerce
item.description: AI shopping agents promise convenience but risk opacity and coordination stampedes; Iceberg analyzes agent behavior.

item.title: Context Matters When Comparing U.S. Vaccine Policies To Peer Nations
item.description: Differences in vaccination policies illustrate the importance of context, regarding distinct healthcare systems and the vaccine stance taken by public...

item.title: President Trump Receives A CT Scan, Not A MRI. Here’s What That Is And What It Means
item.description: A radiologist and public health expert breaks down what we know about President Trump's CT scan, and what this means for his health.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Sunday, January 4 Clues And Answers (#938)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: The paradox of ‘on trend’

item.title: Bottlenecks

item.title: Which kind of ‘enough’?
item.description: If you buy an Ikea table, you’ll need 8 bolts to put it together. 7 is not enough. This is a functional sort of ‘enough.’ It can be critical to our su...
